a.n: Ry X - Festival Music In Stock 2016

p.k: Ry X - Festival Music In Stock 2016 2016. RY X, Jens Kuross & Eric Price. Musiques En Stock, Cluses, France
p.d: Australian-American singer-songwriter Ry X comes to France's 'Musiques en Stock' festival with the program from his album 'Dawn'. Although Ry composes his music by traditional means – mainly the guitar and the piano – his band members Jens Kuross and Eric Price further decorate his music, adding many electronic music elements. The result is a beautiful, dreamy and airy type of music with a dash of club culture and folkloric elements typical of most contemporary bards and their songs.
